name: workspace
description: A community calendar platform for Homer, Alaska that enables grassroots organizing and community engagement.

scripts.dev: npm run --prefix apps/frontend dev & npm run --prefix apps/backend start:dev
scripts.supabase:link: npm run load-secrets && cd supabase && source ../.env && supabase link --project-ref caongjwufneioqjpjkvb -p "$POSTGRES_PASSWORD"
scripts.supabase:push: npm run load-secrets && SUPABASE_NO_KEYRING=true supabase db push
